Articles.Content: Just wondering. I enjoy that mod (last I checked it still worked in 1.6), what do you all think? I’ve never encountered someone using it who wasn’t also using RSS

1 hour ago, HansonKerman said:

Just wondering. I enjoy that mod (last I checked it still worked in 1.6), what do you all think? I’ve never encountered someone using it who wasn’t also using RSS

For me, Kerbal Konstucts is so stable these days, no reason not to use it. Or at least just use the DLC pads.

6 hours ago, Nightside said:

For me, Kerbal Konstucts is so stable these days, no reason not to use it. Or at least just use the DLC pads.

Sometimes I like KSCSwitcher because of the easy interface and configurability. I can’t get started to make things look nice (not to mention I don’t know how to model) using KK. The DLC pads are boring. I mean Woomerang. No VAB, etc. it’s lonely  and doesn’t look nice. The Dessert Airfield and Island Airfield are great but I don’t usually design spaceplanes. Not to mention that Baikourbanur was not included as a launch site . The upside of KK is that it has every model (idk the right word, it doesn’t seem like physics object is right) of every structure in the game and you can place it on other planets which is perfect for stories. So idk. I usually use both. REDUNDANCY FTW
